attributes.action: Allow all British nationals resident within Europe to vote in the referendum.
attributes.background:
Because I have livedin Spain for more than 15 years, I have not been able to vote in the recent referendum.
Having demonstrated living in the spirit of being a member of the European Union and now unable to have a say in its future is tantamount to being excluded as one of its citizens.

rejection.details: The Eu referendum has already taken place. It is therefore not clear what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.
